title: Bella Hadid bares ample cleavage in sultry new Instagram shots
text:
She celebrated her birthday on Wednesday.

And Bella Hadid proved that 23 looks good on her on Saturday as she shared some sultry shots wearing a low-cut top and choker while posing with a white rose.

The supermodel gazed into the camera with a pair of smokey eyes rimmed in heavy black liner.

Posh: Bella Hadid proved that 23 looks good on her on Saturday as she shared some sultry shots of herself in a low-cut top and choker posing with a white rose

She wore her hair in an elegant bun and allowed wisps of her hair to fall behind.

Hadid also carried a leopard-print handbag with red trimming over her shoulder to accessorize further.

The former Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star opened up about her ongoing struggle with mental health via Instagram.

Chic: The supermodel gazed into the camera with a pair of smokey eyes rimmed in heavy black liner

She made a post thanking followers for her birthday wishes and emphasizing the importance of making your cloudier days apparent to others.

'Yesterday was mental health awareness day. A struggle that I know a majority of us have dealt with in the past or dealing with currently,' she wrote.

'And if not, you probably know someone who is.. something that I have been dealing with for a few years but finally at a point where it doesn’t consume me as much as before.'

Pretty: She wore her hair in an elegant bun and allowed wisps of her hair to fall behind

She continued that she still has 'bad days along with the good, but grateful and proud of myself to be in the place that I am today, going into my 23rd year of life.'

Hadid's post marks the second time she's been candid about the status of her health, as she opened up to Vogue last December about her fight with Lyme disease and its mental and physical impact.

As a conclusion to her lengthy statement, Hadid wrote: 'You never know how much your words or just a smile can change someone’s day … If you are reading this and feel like there’s no light at the end of the tunnel… there is … and I see you !'

She added: 'You are strong , you are good enough and you DESERVE to be happy!!'

Grateful: She made a post thanking followers for her birthday wishes and emphasizing the importance of making your cloudier days apparent to others
